name: Circuit Breaker (Phil)
description:
This is the result of our first 48 hour GameJam.

It was a private Jam in a team of 4 people. We decided upfront that we want to make a Game in original Gameboy-style and the themes were randomly shuffled.

"Growth", "Glitch", "Running out of Power" and "Random". 

Although those tags didn't make a large appearance in the currently developed end-product so our result only got close to our original idea.
But hey, we made something. :)
